nodes.text: The draped overcloak was an elegant style of full-body clothing worn by the Alderaanian senatorial aide Stonroy Soma during the Naboo Crisis. Stonroy's draped overcloak was created from mauve fabric woven with ornate square motifs and golden lining, under which he wore an ankle-legth white tunic.

Stonroy Soma was to appear as a background character wearing the draped overcloak in Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace, in which he was portrayed by an unidentified extra. The draped overcloak was first identified in Star Wars: The Visual Encyclopedia.
